examples.example: 我来到公司的人事处，工作人员热情地接待了我并耐心解答我的问题。

translate.english: I came to the personnel department of the company, and the staff received me warmly and patiently answered my questions.

examples.example: 公司的人事处很负责任，积极为员工们安排各种培训和晋升机会。

translate.english: The personnel department of the company is very responsible and actively arranges various trainings and promotion opportunities for the employees.

examples.example: 人事处的同事们总是齐心协力，共同为公司的发展贡献力量。

translate.english: Colleagues in the Personnel Department always work together and jointly contribute to the development of the company.
